name: Fifth Formers of St. Clare's Quiz | Blyton, Enid | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Antoinette.

	Antoinette is in the second form. She is just like Claudine. Marie, Louise and Jeanne were three older sisters of Claudine who are not at St. Clare's. Antoinette is a little monkey who detests sports and Mirabel is always chasing her to do sports.

questions.text: Who used to have influence over Mirabel?
questions.explanation:
Gladys.

	Gladys and Mirabel were both new in the second form. Gladys was called Misery Girl because she was sad that her mother would die. She told Mirabel this. Mirabel was made Sports Captain and Gladys was vice captain. Mirabel thought that sports was important and she failed the stiff exam. She kept on arguing with Glayds to make sports better. Her ideas were annoying and Gladys kept on arguing and ended up resigning her post.

questions.text: For how many years did Mam'zelle not see Antoinette?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Claudine tells the gang this when they are up in the classroom. Antoinette is Claudine's younger sister in the second form. She is very naughty and she was embarrassed when Mam'zelle embraced her.

questions.text: Did Claudine say the phrase 'taking to my heels' as 'taking to my toes'?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Claudine said this. She was trying to escape from Mirabel for games and she ran inside Miss Theobald's room. Lucky for her the head was out. She talked and answered herself as if Miss Theobald was there. She jumped out of the window when she heard Miss Theobald outside the door.

Longden.

	Janet's last name is Robins, Lucy's last name is Oriel and Bobby's last name is Ellis. Miss Ellis also takes the fourth form.

questions.text: Who is not a character in 'Fifth Formers at St. Clare's?'
questions.explanation:
Mary.

	Yolande and Jane are in the first form. Jane tries to run away from her problems about Angela and Mirabel. Corny is the nickname for the fifth form mistress Miss Cornwallis. Yolande is another first former who makes the first formers sure on having their feast the night before the match. Mirabel tries to stop this and goes downstairs only to get locked in the bathroom by Mam'zelle!

questions.text: Whom would Carlotta have preferred to share a study with?
questions.explanation:
Hilary.

	She likes Hilary a lot. But, she could not share one with Hilary because the head girl of the form had the honor of a study all to herself. She shares one with Claudine. Isabel shares one with Pat, of course, and Felicity, the music mad girl shares one with Anne-Marie.

Claudine.

	Beth is not a sister. When Antoinette comes to do the bidding of Angela's jobs she tells her she has five sisters and she starts jabbering about them. She also mentions that Claudine is her favorite.

no.

	She was moved up from the fourth form. Miss Willcox thinks she should have gone down into the third.

questions.text: Who took the food from the second formers' cupboard for their feast?
questions.explanation:
Alma.

	Alma was feasting on their food when no one was about.
